name: Just Fajitas
description: If you're a meat-lover in search of a new dish that is sure to satisfy even the most insatiable cravings, then you're in luck. Today, you're going to learn a quick and easy recipe for hot, sizzling fajitas in this fun online cooking game for girls. Fajitas are a traditional Mexican dish comprised of grilled meats and vegetables, tossed together and served with fresh tortillas and salsa. Chop up crisp vegetables and fresh chicken breasts, then sauté them in tasty butter and tangy orange juice to create an irresistible melting pot of flavor. Once the meat and veggies are ready, roll them up in warm tortillas and they're ready to serve!
